name: Introduction to Human Biology
description: An introduction to the biological, health, environmental, and sociopolitical issues that influence human health and well-being.  Topics include genetic variation within and across human populations, biological variation related to the environment, determinants of health and disease, and human behaviour and development.
exclusions: HMB200H1/ HMB201H1/ HMB202H1/ HMB203H1/ HMB204H1/ HMB220H1
